articles.title: China’s Wingtech Dives 10% After Dutch Take Control of Chip Unit - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: The Dutch government has taken control of Nexperia, the European semiconductor unit of China’s Wingtech Technology Co., to address concerns about losing domestic access to crucial technology.
articles.content:
The Dutch government has taken control of Nexperia, the European semiconductor unit of Chinas Wingtech Technology Co., to address concerns about losing domestic access to crucial technology.
